definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: But what if the process included 10 switches and solenoids?
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果这一进程包括了10个开关和螺线管？

sentences.english: Thus the physical meaning of logarithmic spiral mathematics is well described.
sentences.chinese: 从而揭示了数学上等角螺线的物理意义。

sentences.english: The renge of the angle may provide the antenna design.
sentences.chinese: 可供螺线天线设计参考。

sentences.english: The method for the design of the Archimede's spiral cam feeding maehanism is given out.
sentences.chinese: 给出设计阿基米德螺线凸轮进给机构的方法。

sentences.english: The stone pillar has a decorating spiral stripe .
sentences.chinese: 这根石柱有一条螺线的装饰条纹。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the bifilar splitting phenomenon of magnetic focusing spiral curve.
sentences.chinese: 文中对磁聚焦螺线的双线分裂现象进行了讨论。

sentences.english: The orientation of the spiral is determined by the genetic make-up of the snail’s mother.
sentences.chinese: 螺线的方向取决于蜗牛妈妈的基因组成。

sentences.english: It is obvious that the machining marks in both cases take the form of a spiral.
sentences.chinese: 很明显在这两种情况下机加工痕迹都是螺线形式。

sentences.english: Epitaxial growth steps and growth spirals were observed from epitaxial film appearance photograph.
sentences.chinese: 从外延形貌照片中观察到了外延生长台及生长螺线。

sentences.english: Use solenoid operated pinch diaphragm valves for lime addition control.
sentences.chinese: 采用针阀调节的螺线管控制石灰的附加。

sentences.english: Spirals wound in the same direction Are arranger.
sentences.chinese: 采用同方向之螺线编织而成。

sentences.english: It wasn’t only the spiral of the shell that was altered.
sentences.chinese: 不仅仅是蜗牛壳的螺线能被改变。

definition: spiral pattern/whorl of fingerprint/thread of screw
to rotate about an axis/axis of rotation (math.)
